movies.title: Tussen 10 en 12
movies.plot: Between the hours of ten and twelve a piece of news stops a family in its tracks, while around them life goes on as before. Just another summer's day. But on this particular day a piece of news, delivered by two officers in a police car, changes the life of a family forever. As the journey processes, the vehicle becomes more and more crowded with family members, picked up from home, work, the hairdressers. As they sit in the backseat, alone with their thoughts, what they thought they knew about life, about relationships, has been violently altered. And while the focus for their despair is all too clear, around them everyday things begin to lose meaning as the world becomes increasingly absurd.
movies.simplePlot: After the police deliver him a piece of devastating news, a teenage boy and his girlfriend are taken on a trip through Rotterdam to find and inform his parents.

biography.bio: Nasrdin Dchar was born on November 5, 1978 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. He is an actor, known for Tussen 10 en 12 (2014), Süskind (2012) and Infiltrant (2014).
biography.name: Nasrdin Dchar

biography.bio: Cynthia Abma was born on May 31, 1969 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Goede tijden, slechte tijden (1990), Tussen 10 en 12 (2014) and Spijkerhoek (1989).
biography.name: Cynthia Abma

biography.bio: Ko Zandvliet was born in 1993 in Netherlands. He comes from an artistic background: both his parents were members of a Dutch theatre group called Dogtroep. He says that being in the middle of his parents' artistic endeavors while growing up sparked his interest in acting. Although Ko did not attend acting school, he did receive musical education at Arts & Entertainment College in Amsterdam. Ko plays trombone in an Afrobeat band Jungle by Night.
biography.name: Ko Zandvliet

biography.bio: Elise van 't Laar was nominated for Best Actress at the Dutch Film Festival for her starring role in Peter Hoogendoorn's Between 10 and 12, which opened at the Venice Film Festival 2014. She was co-starred in the film Supernova, directed by Tamar van den Dop, which opened at the Berlinale 2014. She was also featured in the highly acclaimed mini-series Ramses, who won the Prix de l'Europe for best European TV Drama and, most recently, an International Emmy award. Elise graduated from the Academy of the Arts in Arnhem. She made her first stage appearance with in the production of Blonde Mientje by D*amor. Before completing her studies, Elise starred in Iets, Iemand by Generatie Oost directed by Laura van Dolron. With theatre company Oostpool, Elise starred in The Misanthrope from Molière, played Harper in Angels in America and starred in A Lie of the Mind by Sam Shepard. She was also seen in Strindberg's The Father, directed by Karlijn Kistemaker. On television, Elise played a supporting role in the drama series Lijn 32 and she guest starred in Love Hurts, Divorce 2, Cinderella and Heer en Meester. Elise also played the lead in the short film Vloeibaar Staal.
biography.name: Elise van 't Laar

biography.bio: Raymond Thiry is a European actor. He started out in theatre in 1987 with his theatre group Alex d'Electrique, a well known group with success in the Netherlands as well as in Germany. After starring in several prime time TV series, he takes up the lead in 2006 in the art house film Langer Licht by David Lammers and receives a prestigious Golden Calf Nomination at the Dutch Filmfestival. In 2009 he wins this same award for his brilliant work in Winter in Wartime (Martin Koolhoven) and in 2015 he is again awarded, for his role in Blood , Sweat & Tears (2015) by Diederick Koopal. Raymond impresses as Luther in the Dutch Crime series Penoza (Diederik van Rooijen). He also starred in the feature film Wolf , the Dutch nomination for the European Film Awards in 2014 and in The Paradise Suite (Joost van Ginkel), submitted for Best Foreign Language at the Oscars in 2016. In 2016 Raymond worked on several films like Een Echte Vermeer by Rudolf van den Berg and the last season of Penoza. Languages: Dutch, German, English Raymond Thiry is based in Amsterdam, The Netherlands
biography.name: Raymond Thiry

biography.bio: Olga Louzgina was born in Kirov, Russian SFSR, USSR. She is an actress, known for South (2004), Tussen 10 en 12 (2014) and Joy (2010).
biography.name: Olga Louzgina
